I've been hearing that toward the end of that Ceremony of Blessing, {@LinkCreature:16#2305#blood mages} came out from the castle's underground levels.

And supposedly...supposedly they have blood stones. They're power sources that ought to be in our hands, not theirs.

Just look at the size of this stone... Countless lives... sacrificed for this stone...

The Blood Stone is a horrendous relic from evil vampirs of the past. As the name might suggest, the stone is essentially solidified bloodâ€”a powerful magic weapon wielded by vampirs of a bygone age.

I can't explain what the blood mages were doing with this stone, but it's important that we find out.
If they've tapped into the Blood Stone... I don't even want to imagine.
